Description:
Proudly Presented With Location To Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family Henley built home has to offer.
With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Just some of the comforts on hand include master bedroom with double vanity ensuite and walk in robe, well-appointed kitchen with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances & dishwasher over looking the meals/family room equipped with timber plantation shutters, Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight surrounded by low maintenance gardens, a double garage with internal access, ducted heating makes this the complete package. Within close proximity to local amenities as well as Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Precinct & Hotel, and just a stone throw away from local parkland, public transport, schools & sporting facilities. Inspect fast as this one won't last!
Insights: 45 Domain Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Entertainer in a Picture-Perfect Position
On a wide Fairways allotment (approx 626m2) backing onto the lush surrounds of Craigieburn
Golf Course, this exceptional residence provides a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle with its free-flowing design, impressive living/entertaining areas & blissfully quiet cul-de-sac location.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior highlights a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes), main family bathroom with spa & separate WC.
Formal & informal living zones include an elegant lounge with open fireplace & spacious open family/dining area leading out to the enormous al-fresco style entertaining room complete
with bar, wood heater & rangehood for BBQ.
Other stand-out features include a well-appointed kitchen with breakfast bar, dishwasher &
walk-in pantry, ducted heating & split-system air-conditioning, ornate ceiling roses, large laundry & linen storeroom. Step outside discover a backyard with additional paved entertaining area & leafy outlook, quality synthetic turf, solar panel system, large workshop/storeroom, plus a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to local parks & Aitken Creek trails, it's close to Fairways Boulevard buses, childcare/kinder, primary & secondary schools as well as easy access to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
Insights: 12 Chelmsford Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
A Timeless Edwardian with Flair
Beyond the picket-fenced garden and captivating facade, this character filled home delivers a lifestyle of easy-living excellence with its timeless period-inspired charm.
Design highlights include timber mantle gas log fireplace, decorative archways, soaring ceilings, leadlight windows and hardwood floors that all combine to create a sense of warmth and a feeling of being home.
Floor plan features 3 light filled bedrooms, centralised bathroom, spacious fireside lounge, sun-filled meals area and gourmet kitchen with ample cupboard space.
Secure single car accommodation with remote control access and rear landscaped yard completes this picture perfect home
Also featuring 900ml stainless steel appliances, ducted heating, spilt system air conditioning, new carpets, double blinds and much more
Located within minutes to many important amenities including Malcolm Creek and Centinial Park Reserve, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central and Mt Ridley College
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
Impeccable Location with Picture-Perfect Surrounds
Positioned to perfection in a family-focused neighbourhood, this beautiful home is set to impress with its free-flowing design & long list of features.
The home's inviting interior comprises 3 bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & private ensuite), main bathroom with vanity & separate WC. Add to this a dedicated open-plan meals/living area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete 900mm stainless steel appliances plus dishwasher & ample cupboard space.
Other highlights include ducted heating & split system cooling, full-size laundry & internally-accessed double garage. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including the Craigieburn shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Near New Family Home with A Location To Match!!
This Modern Home Design has a striking street appearance. Finished beautifully and boasting amazing features that has to be seen to be believed. Offering 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, remaining bedrooms all of which enjoy built in robes.A family bathroom of equal quality and style conveniently serves the remaining three bedrooms.
Desirably situated close to Parks, New Schools, Child Care Centre, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, this home gives value a whole new meaning.
The carefully considered open plan layout maximises the utility of the area, and creates a home able to meet the needs of a busy and growing family. The Gas Fire place, providing an elegant focal point, creating an intimate lounge area to gather with your family members.
Let's not forget to mention the neat and elegantly designed kitchen, ideal for entertaining, featured with 900mm S/S appliances, 40mm stone benchtops with waterfall, soft close drawers, Dishwasher and Pantry. Another full kitchen in the garage with a gas burner & oven 900 mm appliances.
The covered alfresco leads you to the low maintenance back yard, delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation or family gatherings.
Other features include - Raised façade, Exposed driveway, Refrigerated Cooling/Heating, Downlights, Alarm system, Intercom, Floating floor boards in bedrooms, Double remote garage with internal/ external access, Study, Floor to ceiling tiles in bathrooms, 40mm Stone benchtop to bathroom & laundry, Covered Alfresco with fan, tv point and gas point..
The Luxury inclusions of this home are numerous and at large. You owe it to yourself to view it and appreciate what's on offer.
Don't miss out.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
IT HAS IT ALL! LOCATION, STYLE & SPACE
Sitting on a large 512m2 block and oozing with loads of street appeal this spacious light filled home exudes a sense of homeliness with its beautiful neutral colour palette and versatile floor plan that features an abundance of living zones that the whole family will enjoy.
Conveniently positioned to all important amenities the homes design exudes a sense of openness with its expertly planned stone kitchen that seamlessly incorporates an adjacent dining area, casual family room, children's retreat and separate rumpus room that opens out to an extensive decking area completed with café blinds to enjoy entertaining all year round. Complementing the well themed and positioned robed bedrooms is the grand master with his and hers walk in robes and sparkling ensuite with double vanity and shower that provides the ultimate comfort.
Further benefits of this attractive home include:
Solar power energy - 3kw solar panels
Ducetd heating
Evaporative cooling
900mm kitchen appliances
Internally accessed garage
Study
Double blinds
Bi fold doors
New carpets
2.7m ceilings
Located in one of Craigieburns most sought after pockets, which is within walking distance to Mount Ridley College, Windrock Avenue Shops and Parklands. Easy access to Aitkin Blvd, minutes drive to Craigieburn Central, Highlands Hotel /Shopping Centre. Ticking all the boxes, this is a home you cannot pass up seeing. Your earliest inspection is highly recommended.

Description:
TOWN PLANNING APPROVAL FOR 3 DWELLINGS
Builders, developers & investors, take a close look at this magnificent opportunity right in the heart of Craigieburn.
Ideally located within walking distance to the Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, bus stops, schools & leisure centre. The home comprising of 3 bedrooms, updated kitchen, meals/family area, main bathroom, window roller shutters, PLUS 3 CAR BRICK GARAGE with a very long & wide side driveway offering you endless options as far as storage for the boat, caravan or trailer & also contains a full bathroom with vanity, shower & toilet.
Approved plans consist of:
- Dwelling 1: 3 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms, Single Garage
- Dwelling 2: 2 Bedrooms & 1 Bathroom, Single Garage
- Dwelling 3: 2 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms, Single Garage
Currently leased month to month to exceptional tenants. Don't let this opportunity pass you buy.
NOTE: TOWN PLANNING APPROVAL & PLANS AVAILABLE ON REQUEST.

Description:
SOLD FOR $432,000 BY CHAMARA ADIHETTY 0423 904 801
Meticulously designed and landscaped for easy lifestyle with luxurious appointments showcasing an outstanding level of comfort and class, this home delivers on all fronts.
Living domains with open plan family/meals plus a fully decked outdoor entertainment area.
The wide entrance leads you to a generous open plan kitchen, dining and living domain, comprehensively equipped with Caesarstone benchtop, s/s appliances, for seamless entertaining. Sliding doors will lead to an outdoor entertaining zone complemented by a deck and landscaped yet minimal care gardens.
Accommodating 3 generously proportioned bedrooms with fitted BIRs and sophisticated bathrooms. Master with spectacular ensuite and fitted walk in robes.
A host of further features includes, gas ducted heating, quality light fittings LED lights, and remote lockup garage with internal entry.
You will be impressed by the continuity of prestigious traits throughout and love the fact that you can just move in and start to enjoy. One of the finest homes offered in the suburb and with a short stroll to Rail way station, Quality schools, shops and transport. Inspection is a must.
Age of Property: Brand New.
Builder: Metricon
Heating: Ducted Heating
Chattels: All fixtures and fittings as inspected
Deposit Terms: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 30/60 Days
Council Rates: $1200pa approx.
Rental Appraisal: $380pw approx.

Description:
Surround Yourself With Style..
The appeal of the spaces and the size of the allotment combine to define this desirable home where a renovation of impressive quality is complemented by pergola proportions created with entertaining in mind. Flawless presentation, heating/cooling and perfectly polished floorboards enhance instantly inviting living and dining areas served by a contemporary Caesar-stone kitchen featuring a 900mm oven in gleaming stainless steel while three bedrooms and a stylish bathroom ensure comfort and character are ideally matched.
Proximity to Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn railway station, Aitken Reserve, Hanson Road bus routes and schools including Our Ladys Catholic Primary School guarantees immediate enjoyment of spaces that lead to a superb rear pergola where decked dimensions are accompanied by café curtains, lighting, ceiling fan and aspects over the landscaped rear garden. A secure garage and abundant extra parking highlight land size that lets you consider further extending to meet evolving family needs if so desired, STCA.

Description:
Location, Location, Location!
Situated in the Highlands Estate is the perfect balance of space, style and convenience sure to impress all.
This radiant three bedroom delivers smart low maintenance living with swift access to key lifestyle assets.
This residence features a functional floorplan inclusive of a spacious separate formal lounge, downstairs powder room, a sun soaked open plan living/meals area, kitchen area offering stainless steel appliances & dishwasher. Adding to this comfortable floorplan is three generously sized bedrooms with built in robes, upstairs balcony & glowing central bathroom with shower & separate bath.
Enhancing this property's indisputable appeal is ducted heating & split system cooling, low maintenance backyard with alfresco and single remote garage.
In a prime location close to all of Craigieburn's amenities, this property is surrounded by parks, within walking distance to Public Transport, Craigieburn Central & Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre. Be quick to inspect as this won't hang around for long.

Description:
A 5 BEDROOM ENTERTAINER - IDEAL FOR LARGE OR EXTENDED FAMILIES
Perfectly positioned on a large corner allotment, this instantly appealing home offers spacious family living in a premier location. Outstanding bedroom accomodation combines with multiple living spaces and a superb outdoor entertaining area to create the ideal family sanctuary.
A functional floor plan features an extra wide hallway, separate lounge, well - appointed open plan kitchen with generous bench space, expansive meals area and light filled family room. Gatherings can be enjoyed via the decked alfresco entertaining space that spills onto backyard and fabulous Balinese hut that boasts a 5 seater swim spa with Bluetooth speaker. Sleeping quarters consists of pure comfort with large robed bedrooms that are serviced by spacious main bathroom and private master with well organised walk in robe and immaculate ensuite.
Extras include
>Plantation shutters,
>Ducted heating,
>Spilt system cooling,
>Miele dishwasher,
>Walk in pantry,
>Solar power energy 5kw with fronius inverter,
>900ml kitchen appliances,
Situated within close proximity to parklands (Sustainable Park and Encinda Park), Newbury Community Centre & Primary School, Pelican Child Care and Highlands Shopping Centre.
Please Note
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.

Description:
Brand new Top quality 29.5 sq(approx) family Home !!
Located to perfection, with lake views expected to be finalized by the end of the year, Elevating the concept of luxury living to a whole new level, this truly amazing 4 bedroom family home delivers an unmatched environment of elegance & opulence with its bold architecture, intelligent design & best-of-the-best inclusions from start to finish. Walk up towards its impressive grand facade & enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior & warm family character & charm.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms , stunning ensuite & well organised walk-in robe to main, huge living zones with EXTRA DOUBLE DOOR WIDW STORAGE ON PATHWAY TO LIVING ROOM, separate formal lounge which can be used as a 5th bedroom according to the need, brilliant open plan family spaces perfect for large-scale gatherings & state of the art kitchen WITH WALK-IN PANTRY/ 900MM APPLIANCES/ WATERFALL BENCHTOP which needs to be seen to be believed. It hosts an abundance of cupboard & bench space & a sense of luxury for the connoisseur cook.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers, Immaculous Backyard with marble flooring in alfresco with a perfect sized lush lawn which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration.
A short stroll to the local park, schools, Craigieburn Central, transport & jam-packed with quality extras including high ceilings, heightened doors, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, double remote garage, alarm, stunning central bathroom, roomy laundry with great storage & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now before it's sold.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Stylish Spaces Reflect Smart Thinking
Inviting proportions and an ideal position are married with memorable success by this user-friendly family home, where the excellence of the spaces and the ease of the outdoor surroundings reflect an attitude thats totally in keeping with contemporary times. Proximity to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, the Craigieburn Junction Home Maker Centre, Aitken Hill Primary School and the serene, green expanses of Craigieburn Golf Course highlights the appeal of the address and enhances the opportunity for enjoying a fantastic family lifestyle.
Generous living and dining areas at the heart of the home are accompanied by an open-plan kitchen designed so that stainless steel appliances, ample storage and plentiful bench space make entertaining - and everyday life - easy. Three bedrooms and two bathrooms, including a separately zoned main bedroom with walk-in robes and ensuite, contribute total comfort while a separate lounge room completes these exceptional spaces. Decked under-cover alfresco dimensions, established lawns and a remote control double garage with internal access add to the long list of attractions!

Description:
A Lifestyle you Deserve!
Presenting to you an opportunity that meets all the key criteria when purchasing property for capital growth. Located in the heart of Craigieburn in the Highlands Estate giving you the luxury of man made lakes and park lands within walking distance.
This double storey home comprises a total of three bedrooms. Upstairs bedroom / loft. Downstairs two bedrooms, master with ensuite including full size bath, shower, vanity and toilet. Plus, additional bathroom, excellent open plan living with good size kitchen including breakfast bar, gas cooktop, electric oven, Fisher & Paykel double dish-drawer and heaps of cupboard space. Enjoy the large space in your lounge and open meals area overlooking your beautiful undercover, paved outside area.
Additional features include; 2 x split systems, internal access from double remote-control garage, large sliding doors to alfresco area, security doors, fly screens to all windows, high ceilings, square set finish, separate large laundry with ample cupboard space.
With only minutes' walk to shops, schools and public transport access this is the ideal opportunity for the first homeowner or astute investor.

Description:
Large Family Living with Parkland Lifestyle
Spacious floorplan, quality inclusions & impressive living/entertaining spaces illustrate the allure of this large contemporary two-storey home occupying an oversized allotment in the prized Amberfield Estate.
Bathed in natural light, the home's impeccable interior showcases 4 genuinely large bedrooms (enormous master), stylish ensuite & main family bathroom, both with double vanities & downstairs guest powder room (third WC).
Multiple living spaces include an elegant front lounge, expansive open-plan living/dining area enhanced by a gourmet stone kitchen with ample bench space, Bosch appliances & large walk-in pantry. Step outside and enjoy entertaining all-year-round with a well-appointed al-fresco and generous backyard.
Other stand-out features include heating, cooling, LED lighting, full size laundry, instant hot water, oversized double garage with drive-through access & much more. A short stroll to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Amberfield Grassland, Craigieburn Public Golf Course, public transport & both primary & secondary schools. This amazing family home will offer you the lifestyle you've always wanted!

Description:
Build Your Dream Home In Aston!
In the highly sought after Craigieburn estate of Aston, lays this fantastic opportunity to build your dream home on the perfect size block! Titled & ready to go is this parcel of land measuring 14m x 32m totalling 448m2 (approx.) of prime realestate.
Aston is a Master Planned community offering a relaxed Modern and healthy lifestyle in a friendly setting just 25km north of the Melbourne CBD. A great location close to parklands, lakes, New Craigieburn Town Centre, Craigieburn Global Learning Centre and schools, so don't miss out on the wonderful opportunity to secure a prime parcel of land in one of Craigieburn's best locations. Don't wait - this one will not last long!
Insights: 46 Precedence Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Sheer Brilliance, Quality & Perfection!
Showcasing meticulous presentation, designer-inspired finishes & high-end credentials, this showpiece 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom single-level family residence (29sqs approx.) is simply breathtaking.
Astutely designed, maximising space, light & functionality, it features sophisticated entry, formal lounge, expansive open plan family space, dining area & vogue kitchen extending onto an all-weather alfresco entertaining deck, set amidst low maintenance landscaped gardens.
Resplendent in top-of-the-range appointments, including 9ft square set ceilings, heightened doors, Westinghouse oven, dual-drawer dishwasher, walk-in- butlers pantry & huge 60mm Caesarstone waterfall island, the kitchen is truly sublime.
There are 4 stunning bedrooms, 3 present built-in-robes. An opulent master flaunts custom walk-in-robe & impressive ensuite featuring dual vanities, concealed double shower equipped with Abbey' black fittings.
Highlights include luxury bathroom, zoned ducted-heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm/video-intercom, ducted-vacuum, premium carpets, timber floors, excellent storage & automated double garage/in-home access.
Perched up high with its commanding street presence, built with pride and located to absolute perfection, this needs home needs to be on your MUST SEE LIST!
Insights: 22 Euphoria Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Instant Family Style on Approx 647m2 of Land
In a blissfully quiet yet incredibly convenient cul-de-sac location, this impeccable 3 bedroom home provides a family environment of immediate appeal along with options to extend, rebuild or sub-divide in the future (STCA) taking advantage of its impressive land size.
Every room filled with natural light, the home's inviting interior comprises a large master
bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & main family bathroom.
The spacious central lounge leads through to an open-design dining area & adjoining kitchen
with gas cooktop & plenty of cupboard space, plus the added family appeal of a full-size
laundry along with heating & cooling throughout. Step outside to discover a simply enormous north-facing backyard complete with undercover patio, workshop/storage shed (with power), large single garage & additional carport via secure gated driveway.
Walking distance to local buses & Hothlyn Drive Reserve, Craigieburn South Primary School & Craigieburn Secondary College, it's also close to Craigieburn Station, kinder & childcare
facilities, Aitken Creek trails, as well as major shopping centres & easy freeway access.
Insights: 7 Renwick Close, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
